game.description: In a world where evil has risen, you are tasked to find the sacred rune to vanquish the darkness.
game.objective: Find the sacred rune and defeat the darkness
game.reward: 5000 gold pieces, Legendary Sword of Light, Gain a Level.

tasks.description: Search for clues in the Old Library of Eldor.
tasks.objective: Find clues about the location of the sacred rune.

tasks.description: Defeat the serpent of Irkalla to retrieve the key to the Sacred Temple.

tasks.description: Use the key to enter the Sacred Temple and retrieve the Sacred Rune.
Return to Gandor with the sacred rune.

game.title: Quest for the Sacred Rune
